name: Sierra Microproducts
tag_list: virtualization, servers, networking, storage, dell, ibm, hp, cisco, sun, f5, qlogic, emulex, intel, amd, hpc, switches, routers
overview:
Sierra Microproducts brings together the world’s best technologies, renowned engineering design, and proven implementation methodologies to deliver customized IT infrastructure solutions for clients worldwide.

From strategic planning and tactical execution to management and post deployment support, Sierra Microproducts brings together talent, technology, and trust to every client engagement. With a specialized focus on computer networking, storage and server solutions.

Delivering information technology solutions to the federal government, state and local governments, higher education and the corporate marketplace, Sierra Microproducts uses a consultative approach to understand our clients business challenges. It’s our responsibility to offer the customer multi-vendor solutions that provide innovative and practical results.

Sierra Microproducts specializes in Dell, IBM, Cisco, F5, Qlogic, Emulex, VMware, HP, Microsoft and Intel server, networking and storage products.
